wikipedia_page.main:
Jack Smith (born 27 December 1994) is a Scottish footballer who plays as a striker for Drumchapel United.
He previously played for St Mirren, East Fife, Greenock Morton, Arbroath, East Kilbride, Stenhousemuir, BSC Glasgow, Spartans, and Caledonian Braves.
